locallhost

A simple http server that echoes client http request information. Also provides links to localhost (127.0.0.1, [::1]) for easy navigation to locally hosted projects.

Table of Contents

- [locallhost](#locallhost) - [Key Features](#key-features) - [Technical Overview](#technical-overview) - [Installation](#installation) - [Getting Started](#getting-started) - [Configuration](#configuration) - [Deployment](#deployment) - [Documentation and Additional Resources](#documentation-and-additional-resources) - [Links](#links) - [History](#history) - [Development](#development) - [Contributing](#contributing) - [License](#license)

Key Features

Technical Overview

Uses Golang's net/http and `` packages to display request info.
